title: Changi Experience Studio: Immersive Digital Fun
blurb: Discover Changi Airport's history through interactive exhibits.
description: Step into the captivating world of Changi Airport at the Changi Experience Studio. This immersive attraction offers a blend of digital and interactive exhibits that showcase the airport's rich history, operations, and future aspirations. Engage in simulated airport tasks, learn about the intricate workings behind the scenes, and discover the stories of the people who make Changi Airport a world-class aviation hub. Perfect for families and aviation enthusiasts of all ages, the Changi Experience Studio provides an educational and entertaining experience that will leave you with a newfound appreciation for the magic of air travel. Explore interactive games, multimedia displays, and captivating storytelling that brings the airport's past, present, and future to life.
datetime_display: Operating Hours: 11:00 AM - 8:00 PM
full_address: 78 AIRPORT BOULEVARD, SINGAPORE 819666 ©2024 JEWEL CHANGI AIRPORT DEVT PTE. LTD.

title: Shiseido Forest Valley: A Lush Indoor Oasis
blurb: Explore a stunning indoor garden with walking trails.
description: Escape the hustle and bustle of the airport and immerse yourself in the tranquility of the Shiseido Forest Valley. This breathtaking indoor garden features lush greenery, towering trees, and cascading waterfalls, creating a serene oasis in the heart of Jewel Changi Airport. Take a leisurely stroll along the winding walking trails, breathe in the fresh air, and admire the beauty of nature. The Shiseido Forest Valley offers a welcome respite for travelers and a unique opportunity to connect with the natural world. Perfect for families, nature lovers, and anyone seeking a moment of peace and relaxation, this enchanting garden is a must-see attraction at Jewel Changi Airport. Discover hidden pathways, admire the diverse plant life, and experience the magic of an indoor rainforest.

title: HSBC Rain Vortex: The World's Tallest Waterfall
blurb: Witness a mesmerizing indoor waterfall spectacle.
description: Marvel at the HSBC Rain Vortex, the world's tallest indoor waterfall, cascading from a height of 40 meters. This breathtaking spectacle is a true engineering marvel and a visual delight. Watch as water plunges from the oculus at the top of Jewel Changi Airport, creating a mesmerizing display of light and sound. The HSBC Rain Vortex is surrounded by lush greenery, creating a stunning contrast between nature and technology. Perfect for families, photographers, and anyone seeking a moment of awe and wonder, this iconic attraction is a must-see at Jewel Changi Airport. Experience the magic of the Rain Vortex during the day or at night, when it is illuminated by a dazzling light show. Capture unforgettable photos and create lasting memories at this world-renowned landmark.

blurb: A mesmerizing indoor waterfall experience for all ages.
